text: Thomas Lee (born 1876) was an English professional footballer who played as a wing half for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1876 births Category:People from Alnwick Category:English footballers Category:Association football wing halves Category:Alnwick Town A.F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Bristol Rovers F.C. players Category:Hebburn Argyle F.C. players Category:South Shields F.C. title: Thomas Lee (footballer)
